item.description:
COST: $40

If we get a group of 10 or more the cost drops to $30

I have had many people email me asking about a meetup surf lesson for beginner surfers, so here it is. This event is geared towards people who have not tried surfing before, or consider themselves beginners/learners and would like to improve their skills.

The cost will include wetsuit/board rental, and 1-hour surf instruction. I was told that as long as there is not another lesson scheduled immediately after us, that they normally let people practice on their own for a while after the lesson to try out their new skills.

Please plan on showing up a little bit early to be fitted with a wetsuit.

I am going to close RSVPs for this on Thursday afternoon so that I can let the shop know how many people will be attending. So please only RSVP is you know you can make it, and update your RSVP accordingly.

There will also be SUP rentals available for rental. If you would like to use a SUP, please put "SUP" in your RSVP.
item.name: beginner surfing lesson
